settings.html:
ELEDLIGHTS BUYERS GUIDE

LED High Bay Lighting

Looking to equip your new high-ceiling space with brand new LED lighting? Or maybe you're looking to cut your energy bill by replacing metal halide, fluorescent, or even yesteryear's less-efficient LED high bay lighting with one of today's ultra high efficiency options. High bay LED lamps and retrofits provide the lighting solution for warehouses, service bays, hangars, barns and stables, supermarkets, big box stores, manufacturing floors, processing plants, and more. ELEDLights has been selling top-quality high bay lighting solutions for more than 10 years. Here we've gathered some of our lighting guides, customer stories, and videos to help you plan your high bay lighting upgrade or installation.

Or, if you prefer someone with more experience do the planning, skip the guides and go straight to our free high bay lighting layout request. Or lighting pros will set you up with everything you need to tackle your high-ceiling lighting project!

settings.html:
Get a Free Lighting Layout

Our in-house lighting pros have created high bay lighting layouts for hundreds of customers. We can help with yours, too, and in most cases at absolutely no charge. Our high bay layout contains recommended lights and spacing specific to your space and application. Click the button below to request a free high bay lighting layout today.

REQUEST A LIGHTING LAYOUT

settings.title: Blog - Cold Storage Warehouse
settings.itemTitle: Linear High Bays Installed in Cold Storage Warehouse
settings.itemDescription: Our customer needed a light that would provide 150-200 lux between 30-foot-high storage racks in a -4°F cold storage warehouse with a 32-foot ceiling.

settings.title: Blog - Indoor Soccer Field
settings.itemTitle: Indoor Soccer Field Upgrades to LED High Bays
settings.itemDescription: The building originally had 42 two-lamp 8ft fluorescent fixtures and 6 metal halide wall packs around the perimeter of the building. The upgrade to LED high bays and LED wall packs brought this new indoor soccer field to life.

settings.title: Blog - Shop Owner Paying Quarter
settings.itemTitle: Shop Owner Paying a Quarter of What He Used to on High Bay Lighting
settings.itemDescription: Robert Iannucci replaced thirty 250W metal halide fixtures in his shop with twenty 100W LED High Bays from ELEDLights, reducing his lighting power consumption by 73%.

settings.html:
Save on Your Install with Energy Incentives

Upgrading from less-efficient lighting? You may be eligible for energy-efficiency rebates and incentives funded by the federal government and distributed by local utility providers. These rebates can cover a good chunk of your upgrade cost. If you check out the Team Toyota video listed under "High Bay Customer Stories" above, you'll see how easy the ELEDLights sales team makes it for companies like yours to take advantage of these free financial incentives. What's the next step? Click the button below to get in touch:

REQUEST HELP WITH REBATES
